definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: It was an unexpected disaster for the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 对中国人民来说，这是一场飞来横祸。

sentences.english: Even if you carefully walk, there will be mishaps.
sentences.chinese: 即使你小心的走路，也会有飞来横祸。

definition: misfortune does not come singly (idiom)/it never rains but it pours
variant of 厄運|厄运[e4 yun4]
fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity (idiom); sth unexpected may happen at any moment
pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2
related.word: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福

definition: to meet with disaster/to die tragically

pinyin: wu1 lou4 pian1 feng2 lian2 ye4 yu3

definition: extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!
the year's horoscope augurs ill (idiom); an unlucky year
